channel.title: Where-to-Fish on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Where-to-Fish on Ksbigbass

item.title: Bassmaster Elite at Lake Hartwell
item.description:
Bassmaster Elite at Lake Hartwell: April 4th, 2019. Professional Fisherman Visit Anderson,SC

Anderson, SC at Lake Hartwell.

Just off of I-85, at the South Carolina-Georgia border

56,000-acre

Fishing in this area is renowned by anglers across the state.

The lake is inhabited by striped and hybrid bass, largemouth, crappie, bream and catfish

Weather - Conditions

Sunny - No Wind

Air Temps - 50’s Water Temp - 55+

Topwater Action for schooling fish.

Fish are being caught on topwater walking plugs for schooling spotted bass eating blueback herring that is found in the lake. Fish are spitting up the blueback herring as the anglers are bringing them to the surface.

item.title: 10 Highest Searched Cities For Bass
item.description:
10 Highest Searched City For Bass: Compiled below is a list of the most search cities for bass fishing in the United States. Added are the top lakes in the region for monster bass. #1 on the list is Chapmansboro and the gigantic spotted bass that the Cumberland River has become known for.

10 Highest Searched Cities For Bass terms:

Map toggles with controls on bottom right.

1.Chapmansboro

The Cumberland River is renowned for its fish.

item.title: Powroznik’s MLF: Wins Shearon Harris Reservoir
item.description: MLF: Powroznik wins Major League Fishing stage 3 earning him the title of Bass Pro Tour Stage Three Champion. 63 - 04 was his final total weight. Landed 20 fish during the day with an average of 3.03 lbs and today’s biggest whopper was a badly needed 6.04.

item.title: Big fish like big baits: Table Rock Locals May See Less Advantage
item.description:
Big fish like big baits: Table Rock Lake is known for its spotted bass population as well as the quality largemouth and some giant smallmouth that show up from time to time. I’ve caught the biggest spotted bass of my life fishing there. As well as some picture worthy smallmouth. This is shaping up to be a great tournament with the largemouth bass on fire right now.

Big fish like big baits: Home of the Professional Anglers Association

Home of the Professional Anglers Association

item.title: KS RAINBOW TROUT RECORD BROKEN
item.description: KS RAINBOW TROUT RECORD BROKEN: Twice in April anglers were successful in breaking state records for trout in Kansas. Way to go guys! Check out this giant Rainbow pulled out of Kill Creek Park Lake near Kansas City.

item.title: New World Record Sunfish Caught
item.description:
Newer Record Set!

New World Record Sunfish Caught: He was soaking a live nightcrawler a foot above bottom on a drop-shot rig in 10 feet of water on mighty Lake Havasu February 16, hoping to hook a sunfish or perhaps a bass, when something remarkably large inhaled his bait. In-Fisherman… Dan Johnson - February 28, 2014

“I couldn’t believe it,” he says. “I’ve caught red ears up to 2½ pounds, but nothing close to this.”

item.title: Don't Fish In the Trees : The Fishing Wire
item.description: Don’t Fish In the Trees : The Fishing Wire: One of the best pro’s in the business Todd Faircloth breaks down how we are wasting our time fishing the trees. Most often the fish are related to the area because of contours and depth or time of year, the trees just happen to be cover for them. Check out what Todd has to offer you for your next adventure to that tree riddled lake and endless list of targets.

item.title: Video: 40+ mph Wind Milford Lake
item.description:
Video of 40+mph wind Milford Lake Kansas: With our boat launching for a tournament right here at this boat ramp a few hours later, we watched in horror as the waves came crashing in. More rain and storms continued overnight causing the water levels to rise, cool the water off, and muddy things up. What could be better?

Milford Lake one of Kansas’s biggest lakes makes it very angry.

https://youtu.be/hylBi6ohePI

item.title: Clinton
item.description:
Prep for the next tournament at Clinton Lake has begun in earnest now.

Located near Lawrence KS is the next stop for us on this adventure.  

Largemouth and Smallmouth Bass Population

Clinton Lake Wiki

This is a smaller lake here in KS and one that I have never been to.  This is the second tourney in a row that I have never been to the lake at least once.  Add to that, my work schedule did not permit any practice time for this event or the last for that matter.
